summary: This document is an email chain from September 2019 regarding the processing of data from a hard drive seized from Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence pursuant to a search warrant. The emails discuss loading the data into the Relativity platform for privilege review and clarify the data's origin and custodianship.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The data being processed was extracted from devices seized from his Manhattan residence pursuant to a search warrant. He is the implied custodian of the data.

events.title: Data extraction from seized devices
events.description: Materials on a hard drive were extracted from devices seized from Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence pursuant to a search warrant.

keyFacts: Data from a hard drive, extracted from devices seized from Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence under a search warrant, was loaded into the Relativity platform for privilege review.
The data discussed does not include materials seized from the US Virgin Islands (USVI).
The correspondence involves Assistant United States Attorneys from the Southern District of New York coordinating the technical and legal review of seized digital evidence.
